page.title: 05Sea Fishing at Llanelli.
page.content: Fishing in Llanelli is fair all the year round,but there is not a large variety of fish to be caught.Fishermen go out on boats and some do a lot of shore fishing.Some people come to Llanelli for fishing holidays,and all fishermen report that the catches are improving in size and quantity. Shore fishermen have a variety of plaice,flounders,sand dabs,bass and the odd few whiting in winter. With a boat you can catch a much wider variety of fish.A typical fishing trip would catch flounders,rays,skate,bass,whiting,cong er eels,plaice,dabs,gurnard and several species of dog fish such as spotted dogs,spur dogs and smoothhound.Tope and small porbeagle sharks have also been caught.You are better off with a boat for fishing in Llanelli.
